name: Kill of the Dead
description:
KOFD it' s a survival game in first person and the goal is simple: to survive 60 waves. The character has 60 levels and 5 prestige, each gun and ability are unlocked in a certain level , where you can buy during the game( only the game level is safe, the rest has to be purchased in each match).

It also has some itens that can be bought in the scenario, besides places that  have to be payed is that can be accessed.

The game has support to Xone control

https://www.artstation.com/robsonhenrique

https://www.instagram.com/raccoongamestudio/

https://www.facebook.com/RaccoonGamesStudio

Minimum system requirements:

CPU: Intel Core i3-2100 or equivalent
Memory:  8 GB RAM
Graphics Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD R9 270 
DirectX: Version 11
Storage: 2 GB

Recommended system requirements:
CPU: Intel Core i5-2500 or AMD FX-6300 @ 3.5 GHz or equivalent
Memory: 8 GB RAM
Graphics Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or Radeon RX 550
DirectX: Version 11
Storage: 2 GB
